data.chText: 气力；努力；费力的事
data.enText: the physical or mental energy that you need to do sth; sth that takes a lot of energy

data.chText: 你应该更加努力地工作。
data.enText: You should put more effort into your work.

data.chText: 为使这次活动成功费了很大的劲。
data.enText: A lot of effort has gone into making this event a success.

data.chText: 爬到顶上路程很长，虽然费力却很值得。
data.enText: It's a long climb to the top, but well worth the effort.

data.chText: 今天早上起床相当费力。
data.enText: Getting up this morning was quite an effort (= it was difficult) .

data.chText: 她好不容易才忍住了笑。
data.enText: With (an) effort (= with difficulty) she managed to stop herself laughing.

data.chText: 艰难的尝试；试图；尽力
data.enText: an attempt to do sth especially when it is difficult to do

data.chText: 坚决的 / 真正的 / 特别的努力
data.enText: a determined/real/special effort

data.chText: 作出努力
data.enText: to make an effort

data.chText: 公司为节省资金遣散了150名工作人员。
data.enText: The company has laid off 150 workers in an effort to save money.

data.chText: 我当时并不很想出去，不过我很庆幸还是出去了。
data.enText: I didn't really feel like going out, but I am glad I made the effort .

data.chText: 地方俱乐部正在尽一切努力来吸引更多的年轻人。
data.enText: The local clubs are making every effort to interest more young people.

data.chText: 我们需要通力合作才能按时完成。
data.enText: We need to make a concerted effort to finish on time.

data.chText: 我花了几个小时来打扫房子，但费了这么大力气却看不到多少效果。
data.enText: I spent hours cleaning the house, but there isn't much to show for all my efforts .

data.chText: 他凭自己的意志顶住了这一诱惑。
data.enText: With an effort of will he resisted the temptation.

data.chText: 这项工程是共同 / 集体努力的结果。
data.enText: The project was a joint/group effort.

data.chText: 有组织的活动
data.enText: a particular activity that a group of people organize in order to achieve sth

data.chText: 俄罗斯航天计划
data.enText: the Russian space effort

data.chText: 联合国的维和行动
data.enText: the United Nations' peacekeeping effort

data.chText: 努力的结果；成就
data.enText: the result of an attempt to do sth

data.chText: 很抱歉，这篇文章写得不好。
data.enText: I'm afraid this essay is a poor effort.
bend your mind/efforts to sth

data.chText: 致力于某事；专心致志于
data.enText: to think very hard about or put a lot of effort into one particular thing

simple_means.memory_skill: ef 出 + fort 力量；强壮的 →〔付〕出力量 → 努力

ex.chText: 抬起这只沉重的箱子很费力。
ex.enText: It takes quite an effort to lift this heavy box.

ex.chText: 你的付出一定会有所收获。
ex.enText: Your effort is bound to be rewarded.

ex.chText: 每个人都应为减少污染尽一份力。
ex.enText: Everybody should make an effort to reduce pollution.

synonyms.bx: 指做某事的尝试，尤含大量辛苦劳作或毅力。

ex.enText: He has been working with diligence.

ex.chText: 她的勤奋为我们所有人树立了榜样。
ex.enText: Her diligence has set an example to us all.

ex.chText: 他尽一切努力还清债务。
ex.enText: He made every endeavour to pay off the debt.

ex.chText: 我试图达成和解的努力全部落空了。
ex.enText: My endeavours to bring about a settlement ended in vain .

synonyms.bx: 指对困难或新鲜事物的尝试。

data.enText: bend your mind/efforts to sth

data.chText: 致力于某事；专心致志于
data.enText: to think very hard about or put a lot of effort into one particular thing

example: the book was her finest effort

tr: use of physical or mental energy
example: he got an A for effort
they managed only with great exertion

tr: earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something
example: made an effort to cover all the reading material
wished him luck in his endeavor
she gave it a good try

tr: a series of actions advancing a principle or tending toward a particular end
example: they worked in the cause of world peace
the team was ready for a drive toward the pennant

value.def: If you make an effort to do something, you try very hard to do it.

example.ex: He made no effort to hide his disappointment...
Finding a cure requires considerable time and effort.
example.tran: 找到治疗的办法需要大量的时间和精力。
他为改革意大利研究付出的努力

example.ex: Despite the efforts of the United Nations, the problem of drug traffic continues to grow...
example.tran: 尽管联合国作了努力，贩毒问题仍变得越来越严重。

example.ex: But a concerted effort has begun to improve the quality of the urban air.
example.tran: 但是各方已经开始共同努力改善城镇空气质量。

value.def: If you say that someone did something with effort or with an effort, you mean it was difficult for them to do.

example.ex: She took a deep breath and sat up slowly and with great effort...
example.tran: 她深吸一口气，费力地慢慢坐起身来。

example.ex: With an effort she contained her irritation.

value.def: An effort is a particular series of activities that is organized by a group of people in order to achieve something.

example.tran: 在安哥拉进行的饥荒救济行动

value.tran: （为达到某一目的的）有组织的行动，一系列活动

value.def: If you say that something is an effort, you mean that an unusual amount of physical or mental energy is needed to do it.

example.ex: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
example.tran: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

value.tran: 费力的事;困难的事;劳神的事

value.def: If you make the effort to do something, you do it, even though you need extra energy to do it or you do not really want to.

example.ex: I don't get lonely now because I make the effort to see people.
example.tran: 我现在不觉得孤独了，因为我尝试着与人交往。

value.def: If you do something difficult or painful by an effort of will, you manage to make yourself do it.

example.ex: It was only by a supreme effort of will and courage that he was able to pull himself together.
example.tran: 他全凭超凡的决心和勇气才使自己振作起来。

value.def: If you say that something is worth the effort, you mean that it will justify the energy that you have spent or will spend on it.

example.ex: Fortunately, the chore of leaf sweeping is well worth the effort.
example.tran: 幸运的是，干清扫落叶这个活儿是值得的。

partsOfSpeech.dec: ef 出 + fort 力量；强壮的 →〔付〕出力量 → 努力
en 使… + forc 力量；强壮的 + e → 使有力量地进行 → 强行；实行
forc 力量；强壮的 + e → 力量，强制力

partsOfSpeech.d: 要塞，堡垒（保卫国家的力量 → 要塞，堡垒）

partsOfSpeech.dec: fort 力量；强壮的 + e → 强大的地方 → 长处
fort 力量；强壮的 + ify 使 → 使有力量 → 加强
fort 力量；强壮的 + itude 表状态 → 强大的状态 → 刚毅
fort 力量；强壮的 + ress 表物 → 堡垒
re 一再 + in 加以… + forc 力量；强壮的 + e → 一再加入力量 → 加强
